00015         QuadTreeNode::QuadTreeNode(QuadTree *tree, BoundingBox *boundingBox)
00016         {
00017             this->tree = tree;
00018             children = 0;
00019             this->boundingBox = boundingBox;
00020         }
00021 
00022         QuadTreeNode::~QuadTreeNode()
00023         {
00024             if(children) {
00025                 for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00026                     delete children[i];
00027                 delete[] children;
00028             }
00029 
00030             delete boundingBox;
00031         }
00032 
00033         BoundingBox *QuadTreeNode::getBoundingBox() const
00034         {
00035             return boundingBox;
00036         }
00037 
00038         void QuadTreeNode::addObject(BoundedObject *object)
00039         {
00040             /* Children, try to add to them. */
00041             if(children) {
00042                 bool added = false;
00043                 for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
00044                     /* Goes completely in it - added. */
00045                     if(object->getBoundingBox()->completelyIn(
00046                             children[i]->getBoundingBox())) {
00047                         children[i]->addObject(object);
00048                         added = true;
00049                     } 
00050                 }
00051 
00052                 /* Not added, add to root here. */
00053                 if(!added)
00054                     objects.push_back(object);
00055 
00056             /* Add to root and maybe subdidivde. */
00057             } else {
00058                 objects.push_back(object);
00059                 if(objects.size() >= (vector<BoundedObject*>::size_type)
00060                         tree->getSubdivideLimit())
00061                     subdivide();
00062             }
00063         }
00064 
00065         void QuadTreeNode::subdivide()
00066         {
00067             /* Error. */
00068             if(children) {
00069                 LogManager::getInstance()->error(
00070                         "Subdividing already subdivided QuadTreeNode.");
00071             }
00072 
00073             children = new QuadTreeNode *[4];
00074 
00075             Vector2D size = (boundingBox->getBottomRight() -
00076                     boundingBox->getTopLeft()) * 0.5f;
00077 
00078             /* Top left. */
00079             children[0] = new QuadTreeNode(tree, new BoundingBox(
00080                     boundingBox->getTopLeft(),
00081                     boundingBox->getTopLeft() + size));
00082 
00083             /* Bottom left. */
00084             children[1] = new QuadTreeNode(tree, new BoundingBox(
00085                     boundingBox->getTopLeft() + size.onlyY(),
00086                     boundingBox->getTopLeft() + size.onlyY() + size));
00087 
00088             /* Bottom right. */
00089             children[2] = new QuadTreeNode(tree, new BoundingBox(
00090                     boundingBox->getTopLeft() + size,
00091                     boundingBox->getBottomRight()));
00092 
00093             /* Top right. */
00094             children[3] = new QuadTreeNode(tree, new BoundingBox(
00095                     boundingBox->getTopLeft() + size.onlyX(),
00096                     boundingBox->getTopLeft() + size.onlyX() + size));
00097 
00098             /* Clear contents. */
00099             vector<BoundedObject*> original = objects;
00100             objects.clear();
00101 
00102             for(vector<BoundedObject*>::iterator iterator = original.begin();
00103                     iterator != original.end(); iterator++) {
00104                 /* Will add it to the correct child. */
00105                 addObject(*iterator);
00106             }
00107         }
00108 
00109         void QuadTreeNode::findObjects(BoundingBox *boundingBox,
00110                 std::vector<BoundedObject*> *result)
00111         {
00112             /* Add all objects. */
00113             for(vector<BoundedObject*>::iterator iterator = objects.begin();
00114                     iterator != objects.end(); iterator++) {
00115                 if((*iterator)->getBoundingBox()->intersectsWith(boundingBox))
00116                     result->push_back(*iterator);
00117             }
00118 
00119             /* Check children. */
00120             if(children) {
00121                 for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
00122                     if(boundingBox->intersectsWith(
00123                             children[i]->getBoundingBox())) {
00124                         children[i]->findObjects(boundingBox, result);
00125                     }
00126                 }
00127             }
00128         }
00129     }
00130 }
